skills.skill: Field Work (Control Panel Wiring, Instrument Calibration, Troubleshooting)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain industrial automation systems; Allen-Bradley, GE/Emerson
Perform HMI programming and optimize system performance; Factory Talk, Ignition, Wonderware
Assist with system testing, debugging, and commissioning
Conduct hands-on field work, including control panel wiring, instrument calibration, and troubleshooting
Ensure adherence to safety procedures and compliance with relevant standards and regulations
Travel to client sites as needed (25% travel required)

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years experience in automation integration
